item.title: Target’s stock plunges as CEO announces his exit. The new boss will need to revive sales.
item.description: Target CEO Brian Cornell has been in charge of the retailer for the past 11 years.

item.title: Trump calls on Fed’s Cook to resign as administration heightens focus on mortgage fraud
item.description: Cook is one of 12 voting members of the Federal Open Market Committee, which sets benchmark interest rates.
